author: etan_status
content:
I have incorporated the feedback from Devconnect AMS into the libp2p PR, and would appreciate reviews: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2802
As the diff is quite big, each of the commits will become its own PR. I'll submit the next one as soon as previous ones are in. 
First PR is here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2805
